name: Haute-Rive for 2 persons.

reviews.comments: 房间完美，景色更美，总统套房，希望下次再来

listing.name: Haute-Rive for 2 persons.

reviews.comments: Appartement spacieux avec une vue sur le lac. Tous les magasins à deux pas: migros, Fnac…

listing.name: Haute-Rive for 2 persons.

name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments: Staying at the chalet was great, the location, the environment, easy to access and all. Clean and warm atmosphere. The view was stunning! Would definitely recommend!

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments: I've been staying in Airbnb places since 2010. I've stayed in at least 40 places and this is for sure in the top 3, perhaps even the best. For the price being charged, it's a fabulous value. The view is just incredible and on top of that, the apartment is very clean and with lots of wood, which makes it feel very warm and comfortable. The kitchen has all you need to prepare basic meals. Also the WiFi is fast and the communication with the host is very fast and clear. This is a beautiful area also. You can take a walk on the main road from the house for just 30-45 min and see stunning views of the lake and mountains. Highly recommend!

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments:
+ Breathtaking view
+ Cosy and peaceful for two people
+ Well maintained property
+ Walking distance from the train station Haut-de-Caux
+ A Montreux Riviera card is included in the booking for local transport and discounts on museum tickets etc. 
+ Very kind and responsive host

Thank you Gérald for a lovely stay :)

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments:
I had a great stay at Geralds Chalet. The place is beautifully silent, clean and the view is a delight.

I would definitely come back here anytime.

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments: amazing flat with a really great view over lac leman!

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments:
Gérald’s apartment is great. Perfect response  to the minor issues we had,Feels a bit like walking into a Ikea showroom with clean, nice facilities,living room is small and the kitchen quite trendy with basic utensils. Ok for a short stay.
The view from the living and bedroom are stunning. The single beds  are comfortable only for the couples who wish to sleep separate.
Caux with the benefit of the free pass for the train is also easily accessible without a car.

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments: I loved it and I agree with many others that it's hard to leave it once you're there. You feel immediately at home and everything is well thought out. Of course the view and the location are amazing!

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments: We had an amazing time, being in an amazing location to visit all the important places in Switzerland but mostly just to stay in the apartment as well and chill with that perfect view.  I would definitely recommend staying there!

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments: Gerald prepared very good and detailed videos on how to get to the place and use the amenity. The apartment is located in a calm place and has a gorgeous view. It is spacious. We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you very much for your hospitality :)

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

reviews.comments: Best Place ever ! We were there for the second time and it's our favorite place in the area. Fantastic view ! And Gerald and his mother are very very nice person.

listing.name: Luxurious Apartment in Alps with Stunning View

name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: Average stay, cleanliness needs to be improved and the host was sometimes responsive. Take precaution

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments:
The studio is really nice and the balcony has a beautiful view! 
The bus station to Montreux is really near and the lake is very close.

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: Good location, view from apartment is spectacular. It could have been more cleaner.

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: Eduardo is very nice and communicated well. His place is well located, very nicely laid out and the view over the lake is great.

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: The apt is better than the photos, especially the greart balcony. Everyday woke up with the mountain view.

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: Un très joli studio, de bonne taille, très très bien placé et super propre !! Idéal pour votre séjour en suisse ! Je reviendrai !

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: Superbe appartement, très fonctionnel et très chic. Nous avons passé un très bon we à Montreux

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: El aparcamiento aunque es gratuito, tienes que mover el coche cada tres horas durante el día, así que si te vas de excursión, o te llevas el coche o pagas estacionamiento. La riviera Card no está gestionada por este alojamiento, y podría ser interesante usarala.

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments: Logement très propre, grand et bien placé.

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

reviews.comments:
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Le logement est propre tout y est fonctionnel. Edouardo était très réactif dans ses réponses aux questions.
Je recommande le logement qui est bien situé, avec vue sur le lac.

listing.name: superbe studio  Clarens avec balcon/vue sur le lac

name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments:
Alexandra's place was a perfect, with an incredible view! The check-in instructions were super clear, as was the garage location, which is just what we needed after taking a red-eye flight. It couldn't have been easier. 
The location of the apartment is wonderful & walkable to everything  in Montreux within 10 minutes. Also the fitness center (with another amazing view) and the pool/sauna were great to use. 
Everything was incredibly clean.
Also appreciate Alexandra's communication and extra suggestions for activities. 
We loved staying in Montreux and were blown away with its beauty, and the great location of Alexandra's Airbnb.

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: The view of the lake and the Chillon castle is magnificient, and Alexandra is a great host, very helpful and responsive.   The apartment is modern, clean and well organized.  We used the three beds (main bed for two, sofa bed for two and folding bed for one), with two separate sleeping areas (bedroom and living room).   The pool/jacuzzi/sauna/gym were amazing, especially with views of the lake.   Easy walk to restaurants and lake.  Parking garage is very safe.

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: Very good location on the Eastern end of the Swiss Riviera.

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: Alexandra was a helpful and friendly host. Her apartment has an amazing view, and the location is great and safe. The two showers was also nice.

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: Nice view of lake and location is good too

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: Alexandra's place is in an unbeatable location with an unbeatable view. Check in instructions were clear, and Alexandra was  kind and helpful!

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments:
Simply The Best
Alexandra’s place has a magnificent view of the lake, that welcomes you the minute you walk in. The apartment is spacious and pristine. The amenities are of high-quality and complete for a traveller’s needs. There is a coffee machine and a kettle for tea. This is one of the few places that supplies coffee capsules for the machine, a small yet important detail for the ones arriving late or without time to shop. One morning, I had the lovely surprise of finding chocolates at the door from Alexandra - again, a rare treat in this space. The apartment is located several minutes walking distance from the lake and from main shopping areas. Also, one can easily walk for about ten minutes from and to the train station (if not with too many bags). The check-in process is smooth, the communication swift and the building quite secure. This has been one of the best Airbnb experiences for me and will look to visit again. Thank you for a lovely stay!

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: Great place, everything perfect!

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: Excellent location and value

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

reviews.comments: The place was very nice with a great view over the lake and also Castle Chillon is visible from here. Even though it's located right above a busy road we found it to be very quite, even with the windows open. Can also recommend spending time on the balcony while sun is shining or during evening enjoying the scenery. Our host was just perfect: friendly, very helpful  and professional.

listing.name: Entire apartment with an exceptional lake view

name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: Franziska’s place is wonderful! Communication was great and it is very well located, we loved the stunning balcony views and had a lovely time in montreux

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful stay at Franziska’s. Fantastic value-just a few blocks from the lake and from the train station. And the balcony has a lovely view! Communication was quick and clear.

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: Franziska was very kind and helpful! Her apartment was spacious and clean. It was in a great location close to the lake with a great view. It was clean and had everything we needed for cooking meals there. I would definitely stay here again!

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: The best Airbnb I’ve ever rented. Spacious, sunny, private, gorgeous view, nice functional kitchen, bathtub, even a laundry machine! An amazing value in Montreux, and I so appreciated Franziska’s kindness.

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments:
Franziska was the best host I have had while using ANBN. She was polite, quick to respond and lovely to chat with. She even came and greeted us at the train station to make sure we found our way. 
Her property was in the PERFECT location. Walkable to all major attractions and minutes to the main strip. If you’re staying in Montreux, this spot is a MUST.

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: Franziska was fantastic. She though we forgot something on our way out and sprinted to the train to catch us! Her home was a perfect location in Montreaux and I could not recommend enough. The only warning is that the stairs to the home are a bit daunting if you have a lot of luggage, otherwise nothing too bad.

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: This apartment is beautiful... lots of space, lots of light, amazing views from the balcony and bedroom.  I felt very at home here, I recommend it highly.  Franziska was super helpful and sweet and provided me with maps and a lot of information about the city.

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: Franziska is a wonderful host. She was extremely helpful and answers all messages within a few minutes. The apartment was clean and well appointed with everything we needed. We were in town for the Jazz Festival and this unit had the perfect location for walking to everything. If you don’t mind the steps, this is an excellent apartment. Will definitely come back.

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments: Very nice. Great location if your luggage is light!

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

reviews.comments:
Franziska’s place is an easy walk from the train station and had a wonderful small front deck that looked mostly over the mountains.  The kitchen was well equipped with both stovetop and oven and frig, of course. The spacious bathroom had a combo clothes washer/dryer.  All windows had shutters to help block light if that is a concern.  The train ran mostly during the day and really we didn’t notice them during the night.  
Franziska was also very helpful with sightseeing suggestions.  She also provided Montreux Riveria discount cards which made several attractions either free or 20-50% discounted.  Local buses were the also free to ride.

listing.name: Bright apartment with a balcony facing the lake

name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments: Manon is a nice host. She replied our questions very quick. The room is clean as the picture. The location is quite good. I would like staying again.

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments: Great Location

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments: Great host, thank you Manon!

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments: I would recommend Manon’s place. My wife and I stayed for four days and everything is close by. You don’t have to walk far from the station and two coops are in between the apartment! Just perfect!

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments:
Magnificent appartment and awesome host! We are already looking forward to come back to Montreux! 
Manon is the nicest and helped us with everything she could.
100% recomended!

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments:
Manon est très sympathique,  l appartement est tres propre.
Excellent

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments: L’appartement de Manon est magnifique tout en étant bien équipé et cosy, on y a passé un très beau séjour. Je recommande vivement! Merci Manon pour votre accueil chaleureux. On reviendra avec plaisir !

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

reviews.comments:
Manon est une super hôte! Elle n’a pas hésiter à se proposer à venir nous chercher lorsqu’elle a su qu’on attendait le train car elle passait par là. Elle sait prendre soin de ses invités! Son appartement est juste sublime avec une vue sur le lac et est très chaleureux (la deco )  Nous avions tout ce dont nous avions besoin. L’organisation de Manon pour le départ et l’arrivée est calée. Encore merci pour tout et nous te souhaitons une très bonne continuation! 
N’hésites pas si tu viens sur la cotes d’azur !

listing.name: Chambre dans magnifique appartement  à  Montreux

name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: Maria was a very accommodating host. Communication was easy. Parking is a little challenging but doable with meters

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: Beautiful space, perfectly located and perfect for a weekend getaway. Gloria was very welcoming and accommodating; we felt right at home. Can’t recommend staying here enough, right in the heart of beautiful old town. Will come back for sure!

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: Maria was an incredibly friendly and hospitable host. She was very flexible with our check in and check out time and was excellent at communicating. Maria went above and beyond by offering us a free meal and beer after our long journey - this was not at all expected but definitely thoughtful and appreciated.

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: First floor apartment in a period house located in the old town, but very convenient for reaching the station or the lakeside promenade.  Kitchen stocked with utensils.  Maria is very nice and helpful.

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: Très grande et jolie appartment. Hosts were super helpful and great cafe / restaurant downstairs

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments:
We had a really great time in the apartment. Gloria was the best hostess we ever had. The apartment is very central and  you can walk to the lake/city in less than 10min. 
Perfect weekend!

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments:
Great location, very cosy and quiet street. Very nice host.
Appartement is big and confortable, good beds,clean sheets and plenty of towels. 
There was some renovation going on so some parts of the apartment appeared a bit dirty or had paint stains.
Nice little attentions. She has a restaurant downstairs that looked really good and with nice authentic atmosphere, we d have loved to try it. Next time!

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: Maria is a friendly and responsive hostess! The apartment is located in the heart of the old town. There are many cafes and restaurants nearby. Everything is within walking distance. For travelers, the perfect combination of price#quality! Definitely the best recommendations)))

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: Spacious apartment with a full kitchen and 2 bedrooms. Quite old and run down though.

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

reviews.comments: What a wonderful time I did have at Maria's apt in Mtx!!! Not only its location (in the lovely Vieille Ville), but also the space, the cleanliness, the decoration... just everything one needs for an unforgettable experience in this unique city of Mtx. And, as it weren't enough, the kind welcome of Maria. I wish I could have stayed much longer...

listing.name:
Jolie appartement dans la
Vielle ville de Mtx !

name: Montreux Studio near the Casino Barrière

reviews.comments:
If you go for the 3 L’s (location, location and location), you simply have to chose this place. It couldn’t be more central and it’s literally 2 minutes from lac léman.
It is located in a quiet backyard. Edgar, who was my contact, was very friendly and helpful, even when I called him in the middle of the night he rushed down to help us.
Can totally recommend this place.

listing.name: Montreux Studio near the Casino Barrière

reviews.comments: erstaunlich ruhig und super zentral. Blick auf einen netten kleinen Innenhof.

listing.name: Montreux Studio near the Casino Barrière

name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: Great views, convenient location, and responsive communication. One of the bedrooms was a little small and difficult to move around the bed, but other than that, it was an overall excellent stay!

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: Nice location with a beautiful view for the balcony. The apartment is close public transportation and shops.

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments:
We had a great stay here. 
The views from every window of the Apartment are remarkable. 

Also, Edgar provided great service upon arrival or any other time that we required petty items of communication. 

The only minor complaint, if any, we found it to be a bit warm during the nights without completely opening the windows.

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: Excellent (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great from start to finish. Parking was easy, location fabulous as were the views. Highly recommend! We’ll be back.

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments:
Great place and location . Stunning views, you will not be disappointed!
Quick and friendly communication.

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: Great apartment. Gorgeous view. Exactly as advertised.

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: My stay was amazing I recommend this flat for a great relaxing stay, we were 4 it was perfect but one room was a bit small difficult to access the bed from both sides. Other than that I give it a 95%. Go and enjoy it.

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: Thanks Roman for your perfect hospitality.

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: awesome view, perfect location, good price

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

reviews.comments: Worth the price, stunning views, great localization - hosts highly responsive

listing.name: Montreux paradise top view

name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: Great place, everything you need and more! Charlene is a perfect host. His Air BNB is top notch. The only hiccup we had (no fault to this Air BNB) was I applied for a Switzerland COVID Vaccine QR code and we ended up being denied the QR after a processing fee because the address to this location is France and not Switzerland, even though we spent 99% of our time in Switzerland. Really killed several of our plans.

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: Expect great host services and a well equipped appartement overlooking lac léman.  Parking is easy and close and close to Evian le bains or 10 mins to port valais.  Strongly recommend Clément apartment for your stay.

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: Easy check in, spacious, comfortable and INCREDIBLE view. Would stay here again and will absolutely recommend to friends!

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: Very accommodating and easy to communicate hosts.. Ideal location with mesmerising views. Highly recommended.

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: A great stay by the lake.. the entrance to the apartment is on the main street next to the Thai restaurant.. do note on 4 stack short stairs (mean level 3 @ 2nd floor in Swiss) if u got luggage.. we meet nice neighbour to open apartment entrance for us as we arrive late at 6pm.. and supermarket named Casino is really near (within 3 mins).. Noted on the train at St.Gingloph hourly so do plan on your time management

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: What a beautiful location, exactly as per the photos. Apartment was clean and well appointed, really enjoyed our stay.

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments:
Wonderful place with a lovely decoration and ideally situated. Lovely little town where you can find everything you need (bakery, supermarket, pharmacy...)
Appartement fully equiped ! 
Clément and Charlène est really available if any issues. 
I higly recommend .

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: Unfortunately, I was unable to check in to stay at Clement's place due to the COVID19 border restrictions in France. I had to cancel at the last minute and find another accommodation located in the place of my medical meeting. I was very much hoping to stay in Clement's place, as it looked to be a lovely location near the lake. I apologize to Clement for this and hope to one day be able to visit. Clement is incredibly friendly and quick to respond with help and tips for activities to do, I would highly recommend this location and the kind hosts.

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: The house, perfectly equipped and clean, is in an excellent position from which you can admire the lake and the area around Montreux. Clement is a precise and helpful host. I recommend.

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

reviews.comments: The view is phenomenal!

listing.name: Appartement frontière Suisse, vue éblouissante

name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments: The place is bigger than it appears in photos. Everything was perfect and we loved our stay. At first it might seem as if it is very difficult to get there but transportation is super easy from Cedric’s place to everywhere. Fabianne was great. Loved our stay thank you

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments: Cedric and his partner are very friendly and helpful. He was very flexible on the check-in time. The house is cute and well-located. There is also a coffee machine that we really loved! Highly recommended accommodation!!!

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments: Cédric was a very pleasant host for our short and spontaneous stay at his apartment. Easy to talk to and very helpful, we would be happy to come back and stay at his apartement again.

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments: I recommend 100% this place, the apartment is very comfortable and you have a bus that takes you to the downtown. Cedric was very kindly and helpful with everything

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments: Das Apartment von Cédric ist klein aber fein. Es besitzt alles, was man braucht und falls etwas fehlt, ist Cédric gut zu erreichen. Die Lage ist sehr toll, da es in einer eher ruhigen Umgebung situiert ist aber dennoch genügend Anschlüsse in die City, und auch in diverse andere Richtungen besitzt. Für kürzere Aufenthalte ist das Apartment zu empfehlen. Auf längere Zeit würde mir dann aber doch etwas die Privatsphäre fehlen, aber dies ist halt stark typabhängig.

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments:
Entspannte Unterkunft für eine Nacht.
Parkplatz ist ca 3 Gehminuten entfernt, kann jedoch während des Tages max. 3h verwendet werden.

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments:
Logement très sympa, chambre spacieuse et propre comme sur les photos.
Prochedu centre ville et du lac 15/20min à pieds. 
Très bon accueil.

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments:
Agréable nuitée dans ce petit cocon. On a apprécié la proximité avec le Marché de Noël, accessible à pied. 
Je recommande :) !

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments: De passage au marché de Noël à Montreux, nous avons pu séjourner chez Cédric en toute simplicité et bienveillance ! Merci encore pour cet agréable moment

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

reviews.comments: Agradecidos por habernos alojado con tanta hospitalidad  Cedric nos permitió quedarnos con nuestro bebé sin problemas, fue un excelente anfitrión y guía. El cuarto es hermoso y muy cómodo. La ubicación queda apenas a unos minutos del centro de Montreux. Sin duda mega recomendado!!

listing.name: Chambre dans grand appartement, endroit très calme

name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments:
Great location, just a couple minutes from the train station. The apartment was very nice, comfortable and clean. We were very comofrtable and enjoyed our stay at montreaux.

At times it was cold and the last night the heater stopped working. Instructions to find the apartment and the keys could be more detailed.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments:
Ok place.Heating ok.Good at this budget.however bring your own towels on a safer side.

Ok for 2 person.Location is tricky however once u understand the bus route you need to change once and walk up.
Please check all utensils before use or wash before use.Clealness is not there.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments: Our stay at this place was not very pleasant. The apartment had no direct windows because of which we felt claustrophobic and this was not mentioned in the description. The bathroom curtain fell twice and the water was leaking all over the place which made it messy to use the bathroom. There was no drying rack to keep the washed utensils. Oven was out of service. The placement of the apartment to the adjacent road ( which curved upwards) lead to constant flash light of the vehicles seeping inside the apartment during the night which made us difficult to sleep. Also, we had hard time locating the place since there were no clear instructions given by the host as to how it could be reached by local transport. Overall, we were not happy with our stay and would not recommend this apartment.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments:
Thank you Claudio.
 It was one of the best airbnb stays, the location good too.
We definitely recommend a stay in Claudio’s clean studio.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments:
Exceeded expectations! The bedroom is so lovely and comfortable and the TV is huge and has Netflix. Right outside of the flat is an amazing view of the lake and it’s only 5 minutes walk to the station and the centre of town. 
Also the Nespresso machine was a very welcome bonus .

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments: The studio is very good and nice space to a couple. Everything works well. It is near a bus stop. The communication with Claudio was excelent.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments:
Lovely spot, only few minutes from the train station, very clean with WiFi and Netflix.
I'd recommend the studio to anyone visiting Montreux.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments: Claudio’s place has a very convenient location, the studio is clean. An ideal place for a short stay in Montreux.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments: Amazing studio with very good location in the heart of Montreux. You have kitchen, room and bathroom with a terrace. Very good quality-price

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

reviews.comments: Perfect stay for a couple of days in Montreux and the surroundings. The studio has got everything you need for a little getaway with two. Very easy check-in and check-out, clean, fully equipped. By foot you are immediately at the lake, the city center and the old village. The mountains are right behind you. A great location to enjoy a little bit of both.

listing.name: Nice and cosy independent studio

name: À sous-louer superbe appartement Tour de Peilz
Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: Overall we had a pleasant stay at Guillaume's. He was very easy to communicate with and his apartment was easy to access. The sofa bed is small! (And my husband and I are both lean) Between the size of a twin and full bed. The space definitely feels suited more for one person than 2. Otherwise the apartment had a nice view and was functional.

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: Guillaume’s spot is so lovely! It was the perfect place to spend a few nights. The place has a great view and an adorable little outdoor area. Guillaume was also so easy to contact and went above and beyond to make my stay great!

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: Cozy little Studio in a great location and has everything you need. Offers a pretty view and the Host is very friendly. Beware though, the bed is a bit narrow for two people. If you are staying with a friend, it could get a little cramped at night. But overall a very nice place which I can recommend!

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: We loved it there, will def. come back!

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: The view from the apartment is amazing, and the communication was also good. (tiny detail; The bed/couch doesn't really have lots of space to share for 2 people)

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: Nice place conveniently located to downtown Montreux, train station and hiking trails.

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: Verry good ane friendly.

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: Guillaume's studio was excellent. The studio had everything you would need for a short to medium length stay but the best part was enjoying a coffee in the morning on the little terrace looking over the lake and mountains. If I find myself needing a place in montreux again I will hope that Guillaume's studio is open to stay again!

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments: Guillaume's room was five minutes away from the train station. It was neat and clean. The little terasse was a surprise and nice for an apero or a cigarette. In a straight walk we were really fast at the lake and when we walked back in the night our headache from the alcohol vanished. The perfect place to be and to explore the area.

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

reviews.comments:
Studio propre et très bien situé sur les hauteurs de la vieille ville de Montreux.
Idéalement placé pour profiter pleinement de la ville et de ses alentours.
Nous recommandons

listing.name: Studio avec petite terrasse au centre de Montreux

name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: This owner never showed up for our check in.  He/she contacted me via email a couple of days beforehand asking when we would arrive.  We set a time and he/she never showed.  I tried calling he/her several times and sent an email.  No response.  Finally, after waiting over an hour I had to contact Airbnb.  He/she responded to them very quickly.  He/she told them that there was a key located in a mailbox.  When we went to look, the mailbox was unlocked and unsecure.  Many people were going in and out of this place repeatedly.  Anyone could have made a copy of the keys and had access to the apartment. We felt very unsafe and decided not to stay.   The owner claimed that he/she had a family emergency but he/she had no problem responding to Airbnb.  This owner never provided any check in instructions prior to our arrival date.   Needless to say, we had to rearrange our travel plans and stay in another area.  Cost us more money and the food we had purchased had to be thrown out because we had no means for cooking it.  Very unprofessional.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: Great location, great value.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: Everything went really well and we really appreciated the location of the appartment. Fresia is very responsive to questions.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: I really loved my stay at Fresia's place. The studio is quite roomie. The location is very convenient. I will be coming back here when I am back to Vevey.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: Nice studio close to the lake. There is pub nearby and a bit noisy at the night. Everything else’s perfect!

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: Fresia’s place is right downtown and only a block or so from the water.  Easy to get to everything.  We stayed for Montreux jazz festival.  Connections to Montreux are easy with the 203 bus.  No problems whatsoever and a lovely stay.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: Quaint place, excellent location, and responsive host.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments:
Fresia was there for my arrival. Very centrally located place, in great area near restaurants & waterfront. 
Apt is simple but clean and, all bare basics in Apt. If driving parking can be an issue.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: Perfect location and comfortable. We enjoyed Fresia’s apt with the huge smart tv - made for a cozy couple days in beautiful Veyvey. Perfect spot to wander along the water, 5 mins to train, grocery, coffee and restaurants right there. Kitchen was nice to cook up pasta and simple meals. There is no actual # on the door but name appears next to door - check in was easy and she allowed us a little early, too.

listing.name: Charmant studio

reviews.comments: Great location, good value. Not fancy, but a perfect base to explore Vevey, Montreux, Lausanne, etc. Fresia is very friendly, and gave us a great recommendation for lunch at Non Stop. It was delicious! Also, a very nice TV that we appreciated when we wanted to relax after a long day of touring the area.

listing.name: Charmant studio

name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay here, the view was superb, accommodation was comfortable and cosy. Kitchen well equipped, and our hosts were friendly and always accessible.

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: Lovely small place, perfect to spend several days in the region, very quiet and with a small garden with views over the lake. Highly advisable

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments:
An amazing wonderful authentic feel of Montreux, perfectly located above the "Loch"..Lac Leman. Yvan was great as any host should be. So many forget how it is to welcome and how much they should share with guests. Yvan shared and listened and had so much info for walks above 'n Montreux below... Oh the town travel pass a great wee bonus too. 
Soar Alba

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: Wonderful place with wonderful hosts. Thank you Ivan and family for sharing your little paradise with us

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: It is always a great pleasure to spend time in this beautiful studio. The views are amazing, quite calm, easy to arrive and quite well connected. Also, Ivan is really a great host. Will come back for sure!

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: Ivan is an open person and has good tips for restaurants and attractions. The studio is charming and is practically furnished. You even have your own little garden to enjoy the sun. Thanks to Ivan for this nice stay.

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: What a great place to spend some time off and enjoy Montreux and the surroundings!. Ivan and his family are outstanding hosts, really caring, super helpful and nice. The place is superb and the view is amazing. Thanks Ivan¡

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: This is a lovely and comfortable home from home with good vibes, lots of charm and its own small garden. And a small interesting library too. Ivan was a very welcoming and relaxed host. The location is in a quiet hamlet with beautiful views and sceneries. Chernex a small village with some essential shops is only 15 walking minutes away and Montreux can be easily reached by train every half an hour. We enjoyed our stay in this studio and area very much despite some rainy weather. Thank you Ivan!

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments: A little paradise in the hills of Montreux.

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

reviews.comments:
Ivans little apartment is a tresure! We enjoyed our stay at the calm place, over all we loved the beautiful
garden with a brillant view of the mountains and the lake...

Ivan is a very friendly and helpful host.

listing.name: Les quatre cerises

name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: Great location!   Could not ask for a location closer to the Montreux downtown.   Easy check in and well appointed apartment.

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: The apartment is in a great loacation. Close to the train station, bus stops, the promenade, grocery store and restaurants. It is clean and spacious. There is no air conditioning or fans so it was very hot in the summer. With the windows open for air the street noise was very load and difficult to sleep. Otherwise it is a great place to stay and we appreciated that it included a Montreux Riviera card. A great discount card for visitors. Natasha was wonderful and patient since we do not speak French. They also have WiFi now which is a must for foreign visitors.

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: This is a fantastic apartment in a fabulous location.

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: Everything's perfect. Hope to come back more times.

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: Great location. Close to all amenities. Wonderful view.

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: Lo recomiendo sin duda, super centrico, grande, nuevo . Es muy buena eleccion y a buen precio.Volveria a alojarme de nuevo. Si tienes niños es genial. En frente del lago y de mercado navideño. Buen precio.

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: Passt!

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: 此房源要收 300CHF 保證金，只要沒太大的損害會退還。

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: L’appartement est conforme à la description et l’emplacement est parfait au cœur de Montreux.

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

reviews.comments: 房屋很宽敞，地理位置很好，临近日内瓦湖和火车站，十分方便。

listing.name: Appt. 203 for 4 persons.

name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments: such a nice apartment in a wonderful neighborhood!! the Italian place around the corner is a must have!!! great communication and an easy check in.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments: Great place! Very modern and clean!

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments:
A nice place, with all new renovated appliances etc.
I visited with wife and 2 kids, we stayed for 2 nights.
It was a comfortable stay, we needed some supplies and Natalie arranged her concierge to stick up the place the very next morning.

There is a Migros and a Turkish grocery store nearby.
We had a rental car and were anxious about parking. But there is usually enough parking on the street, free from 7pm-7am. During the day, you can park nearby for free (for 3 hrs).

The building is a bit dated, and our first impression from outside wasn't great, but the apartment is recently renovated and very clean and comfy.
Overall we had a good stay and would recommend this place as a good value for money near Montreux.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments: Great place to stay near Clarens train station and a nice summer location to go for a swim in the lake. Good public transport access and able to self cater easily. Near Montreux, Vevey and Lausanne for attractions and nightlife.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments: Great location, easy check in, and good apartment space and amenities.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments:
A nice apartment very close to Montreaux city centre (even on foot). An ideal place to start your excursions in the region. Food shops just steps away.  Nice host, easy communication. 
Parking tipp: a P+R area just couple of minutes away on foot.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments:
It's a really great place.
everything is perfect.
I was impressed.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments: Great location in close walking distance to the lakeside. The apartment is clean and covers all common amenities. Natalia is a very helpful and cordial host!

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments: Good apartment very close to the Lac Leman.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

reviews.comments:
Our stay at Natalia’s Place was really nice, we enjoyed our stay.
The Flat was cosy and had everything we needed. The location is perfect.
Natalia was a great host, she is very responsive.
We definitely recommend it.

listing.name: Renovated apartment in Montreux near the lake

name: Petite chambre dans grand appartement très calme

reviews.comments: Very peaceful and beautiful place

listing.name: Petite chambre dans grand appartement très calme

reviews.comments: Great

listing.name: Petite chambre dans grand appartement très calme

reviews.comments:
La chambre chez Cédric est très jolie et comfortable. C’est propre et modern. La chambre est petite mais super pour deux personnes. Il y a même une terasse. 
Cédric est très spontanément et chalereux.

listing.name: Petite chambre dans grand appartement très calme

reviews.comments: Ein sehr nettes und sympathisches Paar die uns herzlich empfangen hat. Das Zimmer war sehr gemütlich eingerichtet und wir haben sogar Handtücher bekommen. Alles war sehr sauber und auch die Gemeinschaftstoilette war auch Makellos. Ein sehr empfehlenswerter Ort den wir sicher wieder buchen werden.

listing.name: Petite chambre dans grand appartement très calme

reviews.comments: Je cherchais un endroit calme pour travailler le soir, bien me reposer et me réveiller tôt le matin. J'ai trouvé l'endroit parfait chez Cédric.  Bien situé à l'entrée de Montreux pour les départs et arrivées vers/d'autres villes. Cédric est très sympa et accueillant. Je le recommande

listing.name: Petite chambre dans grand appartement très calme

name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: The place is a bit smaller and older than it looks in pictures but overall we had a good stay. The beds are incredibly comfortable and the rain shower is nice. You can’t control the heating so we had to open the windows at night which could be a bit loud with the street noises. But the views more than make up for it!

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: Everything was perfect during my stay, especially communication with the hosts.

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: The apartment is very comfortable and has beautiful views. Everything was as we agreed!

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: Excellent Host

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: Perfect flat for an incredible view on the lake

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: This is a great apartment. Fantastic 17th-floor views of the lake and city, well located near the train station, and a stone-throw away from the lake. Highly recommended for a weekend getaway or longer stays.

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: Apartment is located beside the lake and you will get a very beautiful view of the lake and the city. Highly recommended to everyone.

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: We booked this apartment, but unfortunately when it was check in time, we were surprised that there is someone else living in the apartment. Later they found out that they booked the apartment to two people by mistake. So we had to stay in A Studio instead of our 2 bedroom apartment for 3 days. We were promised to have a discount because of the inconvenience,  but haven’t recieved anything yet, not even a respone. definitely not coming back. Eventhough the apartment is so beautiful

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments:
Flat is great and cosy, close to everything!
Beds are sooo comfy!
Area is full of nice places...

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View

reviews.comments: Good place if staying as a couple or with friends, would not necessary recommend for a family with small children as not so spacious or comfy. Apartment on the 17th floor, well located close to station and lake. Bit noisy because of bad isolation and noisy doors, since kind of an older building. . But view is great and overweights other faults.

listing.name: Perfect apartment Montreux centre -  Lake View
